actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To redesignate the dam located at mile 153.6 on the Rogue River in Jackson County, Oregon, and commonly known as the Lost Creek Dam Lake Project, as the "William L. Jess Dam and Intake Structure".

summary.text: Redesignates the Lost Creek Dam Lake Project in Jackson County, Oregon, as the William L. Jess Dam and Intake Structure.

titles.title: To redesignate the dam located at mile 153.6 on the Rogue River in Jackson County, Oregon, and commonly known as the Lost Creek Dam Lake Project, as the "William L. Jess Dam and Intake Structure".
